question: Will the Charlotte Hornets make the 2022 NBA playoffs?
description:
The NBA playoffs are an annual best-of-seven elimination tournament held after the National Basketball Association (NBA)’s regular season to determine the league's champion. The 2022 playoffs will begin on April 16, 2022. The Finals are set to begin on June 2, with a potential Game 7 scheduled for June 19.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Charlotte Hornets will qualify to 2022 NBA playoffs and "No" otherwise. If for any reason, the playoff teams aren't decided by April 22, 2022 (11:59:59 PM ET), this market will resolve to "No".

question: Cricket: Who will win Pakistan vs. Australia, 3rd ODI?
description:
A One Day International (ODI) is a form of a limited overs cricket game, played between two teams with international status, in which each team faces a fixed number of overs, currently 50, with the game lasting up to 9 hours. 

This market will resolve to whichever national team wins the 3rd ODI between Pakistan and Australia, scheduled for April 2, 2022 (15 AM local - Pakistan time, 6 AM ET). If the game is declared to be tied, to have "no result" or doesn't happen at all before April 9 2022, 6 AM ET - this market will resolve 50/50.
